Hi, Yossi
We noticed that you haven’t yet activated your new Matbia card, and wanted to see if we could help you complete the process.
Did an issue come up?
Look for the problem below, and then let’s see how we can fix it.
• The card has so many flexible options; I don’t know which to choose!
Here’s a short summary of all the actions that you can take using your Matbia card:
First off, the dots at the top of the card setting page represent the four corners of the card. Select each one, and then input your choice of what action should be taken when this corner is tapped on a Donary device (actions are explained below). Make the most of your Matbia card: choose the options that work best for you, helping you donate smoothly and simply.
- Charge a preset amount -
Enter any amount into the box on the right side, and it’ll be charged automatically when the corner of your choice is tapped on a Donary device.
- Enter manually on the device -
When this corner is tapped, enter any amount you’d like to donate on the Donary device.
- Send request to portal/email -
Let’s say you don’t want to pay on the spot with your card, but still want to make a donation. No problem; tap this corner to send a notification to your Matbia online portal with a request for funds.
- Set up cap per user -
In each of the boxes on the right side, enter a set of decreasing amounts. When this card corner is used to donate to a collector multiple times, within a time range that you can adjust using the ‘Reset’ field, the donation amount will decrease with each tap.
Here’s an example of how it works: You enter $50.00 on Attempt 1, $5.00 on Attempt 2, $2.50 on Attempt 3, and finally, $1.00 on Attempt 4. In the ‘Reset’ field at the bottom, you enter 6 months. The first time a collector comes for a donation, you’ll tap this corner, and they’ll receive $50.00 On the second, they’ll receive $5.00, and so on. If you encounter the same collector again after 6 months, the cycle will begin again, and they’ll receive $50 as per Attempt 1.
This feature is ideal for collectors that you donate to frequently, never expending too many funds on one charity.
- Charge random amount -
This one’ll be fun: allow a collector to charge your card any amount, within a range you're comfortable with. Use the boxes on the right side to set a minimum and maximum donation amount.
• Thanks, but I still need some help setting up my card.

• It’s something else.
